name: projectsend
description: ProjectSend is a self-hosted file sharing platform that allows organizations to upload files and make them available to specific clients or users. It supports permissions, groups, and secure transfers.
features: Client management: Create and manage client accounts with individual access to assigned files.
File uploads: Upload files through web interface or FTP for distribution to clients.
Permission control: Set granular permissions for who can view, download, or manage specific files.
Group organization: Organize clients into groups for efficient file distribution to multiple recipients.
Download tracking: Monitor file downloads with timestamps and client activity logs.
Email notifications: Automatically notify clients when new files are available for download.
Expiration dates: Set automatic expiration for file access to enforce time-limited sharing.
Public links: Generate public download links for sharing files without requiring client accounts.
Branding options: Customize the interface with your logo and colors for professional presentation.
Search functionality: Find files quickly using search across filenames, descriptions, and categories.
Activity reports: Generate reports on file uploads, downloads, and client activity.
Secure transfers: Protect file transfers with SSL encryption and password-protected downloads.
